meanings.definition: Affenpinschers: a breed of small dog with a shaggy coat and a monkey-like face.
meanings.sent1: The affenpinschers at the dog show were so cute and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of affenpinschers playing in the park.
meanings.sent3: The affenpinschers decided to have a fashion show with their shaggy coats.
meanings.sent4: Her affenpinscher's face resembled that of a mischievous monkey.
meanings.sent5: The affenpinschers' shaggy coats made them look like little teddy bears.

meanings.definition: Affenpinschers: plural form of affenpinscher, referring to more than one of the breed.
meanings.sent1: We visited a kennel that had many affenpinschers running around.
meanings.sent2: The affenpinschers in the competition all looked unique and adorable.
meanings.sent3: The affenpinschers threw a party to celebrate their wins at the show.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the joyful barks of the affenpinschers.
meanings.sent5: The affenpinschers' playful antics brought smiles to everyone's faces.
